flood season. The 2025 high school graduation exam
will include two compulsory subjects,
math and literature, and two optional subjects.  The content was
proposed by the Ministry of Education and Training at
the meeting of the National Council for Education
and Human Resource Development held
yesterday. Before that, the ministry said it had
consulted widely on three exam options, of
which  Option one is to take two compulsory subjects:
Literature, Mathematics and two elective subjects.
Option two includes three compulsory subjects, literature,
mathematics, foreign languages ​​and two elective subjects
and Option three is to take four compulsory subjects, literature,
mathematics and foreign languages.  history and two
elective subjects, the ministry also announced the results of a
survey with nearly 18,000 teachers, according to
which nearly 60 minutes chose option 2+ 2, the
majority of local experts also
agreed with this option, choosing 2 C2  has the
advantage of reducing exam pressure for
students and reducing costs for students' families
and society when candidates only take four
subjects compared to the current Six Subjects, the number of exam sessions
is reduced by one session compared to the present.
Choosing the option is to reduce
exam pressure for candidates. At the same time,
allowing students to choose two exam subjects
helps them have career orientation
according to their own abilities and interests,
not only for adults but also for
students.  Students are also susceptible to

According to regulations, the individual involved was driving
a motorbike driven by a male student. The brake
suddenly led to a fall and was
hit by a container truck, causing his death. The
accident occurred on Pham Van Sang street, Xuan The Thuong
commune, Hoc district.
Ho Chi Minh City and yesterday
afternoon, according to security camera images, two
motorbikes driven by two male students and a
container truck traveling
in the same direction from Phan Van Hon street to
Duong Cong Khi street more than 2:00 p.m. on the same
day.  When three vehicles arrived in front of house number 37b Pham
Van Sang, a motorbike tried to pass in
front of the container truck. This vehicle then collided
with the rear wheel of the container truck. The
motorbike driver fell on the road and was hit by the
container truck and died at the intersection.  where the male
student driving the motorbike behind
suddenly slowed down and also fell but was not injured. The male student
escaped and said that
both of them were close friends in 10th grade and
the friend died while trying to
pass a container truck.  Discovering an obstacle, he suddenly
braked causing the car to fall, leading to an accident. Hoc
Mon district police are continuing to
search for the container truck involved in the
accident. It left the scene to
clarify the
incident. Last night there was an accident.  Traffic
between trucks and motorbikes on road dt741
passing through Phu My street, Tan Phu ward,
Dong Xoai city, Binh Phuoc province also
caused one person to
die. According to initial information, around 9:30 p.m. on the
same day, a truck with an unknown person
Controlling traffic on road dt741, heading
from Dong Xoai city to Binh
Duong province, when the vehicle reached Cam stream roundabout
in Phu My neighborhood, Tan Phu ward, it
suddenly collided with a motorbike driven by Mr. Bui
Van Thao, 44 ​​years old, residing in Dong district.  Phu, Binh Phuoc province,
controlled the traffic in
front to hit Thao hard, causing Mr. Thao to
die on the spot. The cause of the accident is being
investigated and clarified by the authorities in
recent days due to the impact of
heavy rains and floods on the Trang bridge in Mi district.  Khanh
Vnh, Khanh Ho province, was flooded. Provincial road
two was cut in half by the flood, causing many cars and
trucks that wanted to overcome the flood had to run
tents onto the suspension bridge, which was very
dangerous for people to live under the destructive power of the
bridge's floodwaters.  The spillway is located on provincial road two connecting the
center of Khanh Vinh town with the
northwest communes of the district. The flood flow from
the upstream of the river flooded the bridge,
cutting provincial road two in half. The local government
had to ban all traffic.  To facilitate
traffic through here, in this situation,
people used the residential suspension bridge,
which is only for motorbike traffic.
However, many cars, including trucks,
tried to rush onto the suspension bridge to cross
the river.  Accepting the structural load of the bridge
as well as the risk of bridge collapse to ensure
safety for people, local authorities
need to regulate the circulation of
cars across this residential suspension bridge. Leaders of
Tay Hoa district, Phu Yen province have confirmed  received yesterday
afternoon in Hoa Phu commune. There was a
flooding incident that left four students
dead and
missing. According to initial information, around 2:00 p.m.
yesterday, six students, all students of
class 5C of Hoa Phu Primary School, arrived.  They studied
physical education at school, but because it was raining, the
school canceled school, so they went to the river
embankment area, Lien Thach village, Hoa
Phu commune, Tay Hoa district, to bathe. Here, four
students went into the water, two of them stood on the
inner bank.  While playing, all four children were
swept away by the water. Two of them were on the shore and shouted for
help. However, all four
children were missing by the end of the afternoon. The
bodies of two of the four missing students
were found today.  The
authorities are still trying to find the
remaining victims.
Rach Gia City Police, Ky Giang Province,
said they had just caught three subjects red-handed
transporting a large amount of smuggled cigarettes. The
above subjects included Vo Van Phat.  Lam
Bao Du and Mr. Bao Linh both slept in Kien

information. At about 1:00 a.m.,
Rach Gia city police conducted a checkpoint to
check a truck with license plate number
71c 00184.  Examining the vehicle, the
authorities discovered
29.23 smuggled foreign cigarettes. The police
made a record to confiscate the cigarettes

Spain continues to have a headache with the situation of
migrants as this year the number of migrants
to Spain set a record of 32,000
people with the current situation where the
country's police have encountered many difficulties in
identifying minors.
Many teenagers had to
endure a decade-long journey
exhausted and hungry
on a wooden boat traveling along the
world's most dangerous migration route
to the Canary Islands even when  Once
landed they could still face
another big problem of being registered as adults by the police
and then taken to a
former military base in the mountains of Tenerife
instead of to a juvenile center
although  must have a bone test
to determine their age. The police here
registered many children with the same date
of birth on January 1, 2005 because the
number of migrants to Spain was so
large that it was difficult to identify
minors.  The Prosecutor General's Office,
which handles similar matters, said
it had reviewed 48 cases of suspected
minors at the Last
Rises camp this year and confirmed four
cases of minors.  The 30-year-old
case, which is undergoing age testing,
has also been sent to the children's center,
and the remaining 14 people are still waiting to be
evaluated. 15 major Chinese cities
including Beijing and Chengzhen will replace
all  Electric vehicle public transportation
This ambitious plan was just
announced by Chinese authorities
yesterday, the project mobilizes resources from eight
Chinese ministries, and
public transportation in the replacement plan
includes  including buses, taxis, vehicles used in
cleaning services, postal,
express delivery and logistics. In general,
this plan is expected to replace more than 6 public
service vehicles in 15 cities
within 2 years and build about  700,000
charging stations and 7800 battery replacement stations according to the
Chinese Ministry of Industry and Information Technology
This plan aims to promote the
development of emerging technologies such as
smart charging and high-power charging
while improving technology in
A box of dinosaur skulls is
about to be auctioned in
Paris, France next week.
This skull is named baby gene and is 68
million
years old. Baby J's skull belongs to a dinosaur.
Triceratops
this gentle herbivorous dinosaur was about 9 meters long and
weighed 12 tons. The skull was discovered
in the US state of South Dakota in
1998. This skull is a dinosaur skull
that both children and  adults recognize
Triceratops as an
animal that everyone knows. The baby skull will be
offered by auctioneer Chris in a

where the skull is valued at about 300
to 500,000 VND.  Euro 2021 a

500,000 pounds, more than 550,000
